title: WANdisco Announces Zettabyte Sponsorship Of Strata + Hadoop World 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 1:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: WANdisco, Plc. 
SAN RAMON, CA--(Marketwired - September 24, 2015) - WANdisco (LSE: WAND) the leading provider of continuous-availability software for global enterprises to meet the challenges of Big Data, announced it will be a Zettabyte Sponsor of Strata + Hadoop World conference ( http://strataconf.com ). The conference will be held September 29 - October 1, 2015, at the Javits Center in New York City. WANdisco will be in booth 325. 
On Thursday, October 1, WANdisco CTO, Jagane Sundar will present, "Eventual consistent systems A.K.A. mostly inconsistent systems vs. strongly consistent systems in big data," a session designed to explore the actual behavior of eventual consistent systems and argues that they should, in fact, be called mostly inconsistent systems. For a look at WANdisco's presence or to learn more about the conference, visit http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ny-2015 . 
"Downtime related to Hadoop deployments is no longer acceptable. For enterprises around the world, it means WANdisco Fusion is the only answer," said David Richards, WANdisco CEO and Co-Founder. "Strata + Hadoop World attendees will experience firsthand how working with WANdisco can accelerate their transformation into production." 
The future belongs to those who know how to use data and have continuous availability to it. To survive and thrive in a data-driven future, Strata + Hadoop World brings together the best minds in strategy, science, and industry for the defining event of the big data community. Educational sessions explore an array of big data topics including data innovations, data science and advanced analytics; IoT and Real Time; Hadoop use cases; Spark and beyond; and design, user experience and visualization.

About WANdisco 
WANdisco (LSE: WAND) is a provider of enterprise-ready, non-stop software solutions that enable globally distributed organizations to meet today's data challenges of secure storage, scalability and availability. WANdisco's products are differentiated by the company's patented, active-active data replication technology, serving crucial high availability (HA) requirements, including Hadoop Big Data and Application Lifecycle Management (ALM), including Apache Subversion and Git. Fortune Global 1000 companies, including Juniper Networks, Motorola, and Halliburton, rely on WANdisco for performance, reliability, security and availability. For additional information, please visit http://www.wandisco.com .
